title: Item Idea
body:
https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/6/61/Scuttle_Crab.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20141028005017

Judging by the picture, you already know what I am coming up with...

The item will be called "Scuttler Shooter" and its global skillshot item...
For every scuttle you kill applies a stack, you can use a stack every 60 seconds to fire a rift scuttler out  in a target direction, and into enemies it flies into. The item also grants bonus armor and magic resist, as well as movement speed.

It was all dark, all covered in smoke blacker than a paper dipped in the thickest ink. There was nothing... all the world that had once stood there was gone, lost to oblivion, to thousands of meaningless whispers like an apocalyptic song with no instruments and no voices. And there, on a patch of dusty ground facing the great abyss of death, Kindred were smiling, silently.

'Everything ends', Lamb said.
'But we always remain!', Wolf answered, with his thick but playful voice.
'Ah, the silence of pure darkness... The tranquility of mist, the peacefulness of this black sky...'

Then, a dazzling greenish star broke through the inkblack sky, burning bright in a bath of flaming particles. Kindred watched.
'What is that, dear Lamb? Didn't we kill... everything?'

Lamb be like: *MAN WHAT'S THAT WE ACED THE ENEMY TEAM, I GOT A PENTAKILL, WHA-*

And then that damn greenie star turns to be a damn FLYING SCUTTLER CRAB and it hits Lamb in the face and Wolf is like
'WHAT. THE. HECK?!' The end.

Scuttler’s Cannon

{{item:2053}} + {{item:1057}} + 1080 gold (2700 total)

+55 Armor
+55 Magic Resist

UNIQUE PASSIVE – POINT RUNNER: Builds up to 20% bonus movement speed over 2 seconds while in the river or near turrets, fallen turrets and Void Gates.

UNIQUE PASSIVE – SCUTTLER STORAGE: Takedowns on the Rift Scuttler grant a stack of Scuttler Hoarder.

UNIQUE ACTIVE – SCUTTLER AIRLINES: Expends a stack of Scuttler Hoarder to launch an untargetable Rift Scuttler in the target direction.  Upon colliding with an enemy champion, the Scuttler deals 80-240 (based on level) damage and slows them by 80%, decaying over 2 seconds (60 second cooldown).
